data.title: The biggest Millennium Party in the world
data.meta_description: Buckle up – for 10 hours of nonstop partying on September 07.09.2024th, XNUMX in the VELTINS Arena with our great live acts and our DJ Mokaby!
data.text:
TICKET PRICES

Ticket presale start exclusively on www.eventim.de on Wed. March 27, 2024 at 10.00:XNUMX a.m.

General Admission: 49,00€ incl. fees

General Admission - Front of Stage: 69,00€ incl. fees

General Admission - lower tier: 49,00€ incl. fees

Reserved Seating - lower tier: 59,00€ incl. fees

Reserved Seating - upper tier: 49,00€ incl. fees

TICKET PRESALE

There are several ways to get tickets for Flashback Megashow:

On the Internet:

Ticket presale start exclusively on www.eventim.de on Wed. March 27, 2024 at 10.00:XNUMX a.m.

From Friday, March 29, 2024, 10.00 a.m., you can stay here on our website and go to our official FLASHBACK MEGASHOW ticket shop, put tickets in your shopping cart and complete your order when you have everything 'packed'.

By phone:

We are personally available Monday to Friday from 10:00 a.m. to 18:00 p.m. at: +49 (0)40 413 22 60.

By email:

Send an email to tickets@kj.de – but this is only recommended if you know exactly what you want and the tickets are still available.

At a stationary ticket office: Under this Link you will find all advance booking offices nearby.

BOX OFFICE

On the day of the event there will be a box office at the West Ticket Office from 13:00 p.m.

VENUE ADDRESS

VELTINS Arena

Rudi-Assauer-Platz 1

45891 Gelsenkirchen, Germany

View on Google Maps

DIRECTIONS

By public transport

Arrival from the main station by tram

The Gelsenkirchen underground station in the Centralstation is located on the first underground level of the station. You can take tram line 1 (direction GE-Buer) directly to the “VELTINS-Arena” stop. The journey takes about 302 minutes.

Tips for people with disabilities

People with limited mobility can reach the arena via stop “Willy-Brandt-Allee”. This stop is step-free and only a little further away from the arena. From here, please follow the signs.

By bicycle

You can also reach the VELTINS Arena in an environmentally friendly way by bike. There are over 600 bicycle parking spaces available around the arena. These are located in front of Tunnel 1 and behind the East ticket office.

By car

By car, you can get to the arena directly via exit 6 - Gelsenkirchen-Buer - on highway A2 or exit 17 - Gelsenkirchen-Schalke - on the highway A42. From the junctions, please follow the signs to VELTINS Arena.

PARKING

A total of 14.000 parking spaces are available on site.

Destination for the navigation system

To the parking lots A, B, C1, C2, C3 and "Kinocenter": Adenauerallee 118

To the parking lots D1, D2, D3, D4, E1 and E2: Ötte-Tibulsky-Weg or Willy-Brandt-Allee 52

Parking fees

Parking tickets are available for parking garages 2 and 3 for 30 Euros. Depending on availability, these can be purchased directly from the steward on event day, in advance by phone or at the counter in the S04 Service Center, or alternatively online in the S04 ticket shop.

For the Medicos car park Visitors can also purchase parking tickets for 30 euros by phone and at the counter in the S04 Service Center or online in the S04 ticket shop.

Depending on availability, day tickets for P3 can be purchased for 30 euros by phone and at the counter in the S04 Service Center or Online in the S04 ticket shop be secured.

It is not possible to purchase park season tickets.

At Lots B-E parking fees of 5 euros per vehicle will be charged two hours before the start. Visitors are asked to pay their parking fees either at several pay machines on site, completely digitally via QR code or via the APCOA Flow app. Those who arrive earlier pay nothing.

Note: You can pay at the pay machines by inserting coins, using debit or credit cards, as well as using Google Pay and Apple Pay. The machines do not accept banknotes.

If the parking fee is not paid, the service provider "Park & ​​Control" will send a payment request for 35 euros. This consists the parking fee of 5 euros and a contractual penalty of 30 euros. The person holding the vehicle is identified by taking a license plate photo and then notified by letter.

Overnight parking

The car can remain in the parking spaces until 08:00 a.m. the following day. Please note, however, that the parking spaces are not guarded at night and we accept no liability for damage to the vehicle.

Exception: The parking garage closes at 02:00 a.m. regardless of the end of the event.

TAXI STANDS

After the event and until the VELTINS Arena closes, you will find taxis that you can use directly at the main entrance, in front of the "LaOla" exit. There is also another taxi stand on "Parkallee" at public parking lot A.

TIMING

Entry: 13:00 p.m.

Start: 14:00 p.m.

End: approx. 23:00 p.m.

Permitted items

For security reasons, only bags up to DIN A4 format (21 cm x 29,7 cm) may be brought into the arena after manual inspection.

It makes the work of the security and order services easier if all visitors limit themselves to the most necessary items such as wallets, mobile phones, keys, etc.

PROHIBITED ITEMS

According to the stadium regulations under §5 Prohibitions, visitors to the VELTINS Arena are prohibited from bringing the following items with them:

Weapons and other dangerous objects that are capable of causing or causing injury or are suitable or intended to damage property

Protective weapons or clothing or objects suitable as protective weapons and intended, under the circumstances, to ward off enforcement measures by a holder of sovereign powers

Gas spray cans, corrosive or colouring substances, flammable liquids or pressure containers for highly flammable or harmful gases, excluding commercially available pocket lighters

Bottles (including PET bottles), cups, jugs, cans or other containers made of fragile, splintering or particularly hard material; it is permitted to carry non-alcoholic beverages up to 0,5 litres as a “Tetra Pak”

Bulky items such as ladders, stools, chairs, boxes, suitcases, backpacks and bags larger than A4 format

Fireworks, rockets, Bengal lights, smoke powder, smoke bombs, flares and other pyrotechnic items

Flag or banner poles longer than two metres or with a diameter greater than three centimetres, as well as large banners, double holders and large quantities of paper or wallpaper rolls

Mechanically and electrically operated noise instruments

Devices for sound or speech amplification

Laser pointer

Alcoholic beverages of all kinds

Spray dryer

Animals

Violence-glorifying, racist, xenophobic, anti-Semitic as well as left- and right-wing radical propaganda material

Other objects which by their nature are suitable and intended to injure persons or damage property

Items that are suitable and intended, under the circumstances, to prevent the identification of the person

Cameras, video cameras and other sound or image recording devices for commercial use (unless the organizer has given their consent)

Fan paraphernalia, insofar as it is used to provoke other fan groups.

Power banks (from a size of 10x7x3cm)

LOST ITEMS

If you lose any items on the day of the event, please contact the service point at staircase no. 5 / north entrance.

ACCESS CONTROLS

Access to the VELTINS Arena is fully automated. Visitors enter the arena through electronic turnstiles at the entrance areas. They automatically regulate access to the correct block using the barcodes on the tickets. Ticket forgeries and double entry on one ticket are therefore impossible.

RE-ENTRY TO THE VENUE

Tickets will be invalidated upon entry to VELTINS Arena. If you leave the arena early, you will not be able to re-enter the VELTINS Arena. We ask for your understanding.

WARDROBE

Unfortunately, there are no cloakrooms or lockers at VELTINS Arena.

FOOD AND DRINKS

Unfortunately, bringing food and drinks into VELTINS-Arena is not permitted. There will be numerous food and drink stands in the arena where you can get food and drink throughout the day.

PAYMENT OPTIONS IN THE VELTINS-Arena:

Food and drinks can be paid for contactless, quickly and easily at all kiosks in the VELTINS Arena using EC, debit or credit cards as well as Apple Pay and Google Pay.

Cash payments are not possible at the kiosks.

Alternatively, the "Knappenkarte" (VELTINS-Arena's own payment card) can be purchased on site, which can be topped up with cash at the pay counters in the arena or, if possible, in the official S04 app to avoid long waiting times at the top-up stations.

CONVERTIBLE ROOF AT VELTINS-Arena

Depending on the weather conditions, the roof will be open or closed.
